sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { Search, Star, ChevronDown } from "lucide-react"; import jobLogo from "./job-logo.png"; // Job Company Logo import bgImage from "./bg.png"; // Background Image const jobs = [ { id: 1, company: "K&D Garment", description: "නොවැම්බර් 16 සහ 17 දින පැවත්වෙන චන්දය ව්‍යාපාරය සඳහා vote activation sampling and selling...", reviews: "5,291 reviews", price: "Rs. 3500.00", time: "(9.00am to 6.00pm)", location: "116-පිළියන්දල", logo: jobLogo, }, ]; const Home = () => { return (
{/* Hero Section */}

Find Your Perfect
Part-Time Job

{/* Search Bar */}
{/* Job Listings */}

Explore All Jobs

{jobs.map((job) => (

{job.company}

{job.description}

{job.time}

{job.location}

{job.reviews}

{job.price}

))}
); }; export default Home;
